aspect: 1. Japanese photographer Yûki Aoyama creates interesting father-daughter portraits by capturing teenagers alongside their leaping fathers in their latest photography series.
2. The images are part of Aoyama's latest book, which roughly translates to "Daughter and Salary Man" and show fathers in sharp suits and daughters in casual clothing.
3. The unique portraits are gaining online interest and feature families posing in front of Japanese landmarks. Some older fathers' expressions appear pained during their energetic jumps.
